about_the_game:
■Synopsis

"CRUELTY" is a Japanese-made splatter horror.
You were in an accident and lost consciousness.
The moment you wake up, you find yourself in a nightmare world, one that is not of this Earth.
In an abattoir ruled by madness, horrific scenes unfold, and inescapable terror awaits you.
To survive, you must solve numerous mysteries in this world of fear while evading the gaze of monstrous beings as you progress.

■Overview

"CRUELTY" is a third-person perspective 3D survival horror game.
Instead of engaging in combat with enemies, players must progress through stages by solving puzzles while evading or hiding from threats. Survival hinges on escaping or concealing oneself.
The playtime typically ranges from 30 to 60 minutes.

■Feature

  • Immersive high-quality graphics utilizing the latest game engine technology
  • Cinematic movie scenes
  • Elaborate depictions of gore and frightening effects
  • Fully-voiced for an immersive experience
  • Difficulty level selection function

■Important Notes

  • The screen resolution is 1920×1080 for fullscreen mode and window fullscreen mode, and 1280×720 for windowed mode.
  • Switching to windowed mode by pressing "Alt" + "Enter" is not recommended.
  • Playing below the minimum system requirements may result in the game not functioning properly.

Video Streaming Guidelines

  • Streaming is allowed without the need for permission, regardless of whether you're an individual or a corporation.
  • Monetization is permitted only when using features provided by video streaming platforms.
  • It would be appreciated if you include the name of the game in the title of your video, and if possible, include a link to the game's Steam page in the description or elsewhere.

We are not responsible for any damages arising from posting or streaming gameplay footage of this product on video sharing sites. Please carefully review the policies and guidelines of video sharing sites before posting or streaming gameplay footage. The contents of this guideline are subject to change without notice.

Warning about Photosensitive Seizures

This product contains flashing lights in some scenes, which may cause light-sensitive epileptic seizures.
If you have a history of seizures or epilepsy, please refrain from playing this product.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains highly stimulating depictions of bloodshed, dismemberment, torture, and death.
